Title: Requires records of elevator and vertical transportation maintenance, operation issues and repairs be made available
Summary: Requires records of elevator and vertical transportation maintenance, operation issues and repairs be made available to tenants at their request.
LawCode: Amd ยง51, Mult Dwell L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the multiple dwelling law, in relation to requiring records of elevator and vertical transportation maintenance, operation issues and repairs be made available
